dialogue.text: Did you know that the human brain processes visual information sixty thousand times faster than text?
No way! That's incredible! So that's why videos are so much more engaging than reading?
Exactly! That's why short-form videos are so addictive. Your brain gets instant dopamine hits.
Wow, so it's basically exploiting how our brains work naturally. That's kind of scary but fascinating!
Right! The rapid visual changes make it nearly impossible to scroll away. It's the science behind brainrot content.
Mind blown! I'll never look at TikTok the same way again.
